On last turn, disable voice input, wait for LLM to finish response, play audio, then show 'See Summary' button instead of immediately showing summary screen
Explicitly instruct LLM in prompts to not use language level too much above the user's CEFR level
Add a stop session button in the frontend during practice sessions that functions similarly to the stop word, allowing users to manually trigger session wrap-up and ending
Persist primary language, target language, level, and stop word settings adjusted before the session similar to settings, so users don't need to reconfigure them for each session
